about_the_game:
For video creators and streamers
KIMIDORI SOFT permits monetization through partner programs using KIMIDORI SOFT games.

Game Description:

This is a game for anyone who just wants to grill a steak. That’s it. You grill steaks. We’ve really focused on getting that jiggly meat texture just right.


About the Game:

Grill three different types of steak to perfection, front and back, just like the customer ordered. Adjust your timing based on steak thickness, and try not to flip it too many times. Nobody likes an over-flipped steak.


Features:

Jiggly Fresh Meat: These steaks are as fresh as they come, with that perfect jiggly softness.

Sizzling Sounds: The more surface area you’ve got touching the pan, the louder the sizzle. And yes, the front and back sides grill differently, just like in real life.

Helpful Tools: We’ve got side cameras so you can peek at the edges, and sensors to check how done it is. Who knew grilling steak could be so high-tech?

More Than Meat?: As a little bonus, you can also grill pancakes. Because why not?

Single-player Only: We figured you'd want some peaceful, solo steak-grilling time, so this one’s just for you. No distractions, just you and your steak.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 650 or AMD Radeon HD 7750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1050Ti or AMD Radeon RX560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
